description.displayText: Crismar has been a fantastic nanny for my five-year old.  From the very first day, she has had a lovely rapport with my daughter.  She also gets along with very well with the other nannies, and has done a fantastic job arranging play dates with other kids.  Crismar is also very hard working (when my daughter is in school, she is a huge help with housekeeping), punctual and reliable.  We have been very lucky to have Crismar helping us and would happily recommend her to another family.
description.originalText: Crismar has been a fantastic nanny for my five-year old.  From the very first day, she has had a lovely rapport with my daughter.  She also gets along with very well with the other nannies, and has done a fantastic job arranging play dates with other kids.  Crismar is also very hard working (when my daughter is in school, she is a huge help with housekeeping), punctual and reliable.  We have been very lucky to have Crismar helping us and would happily recommend her to another family.

description.displayText:
Crismar has been a wonderful Nanny for our almost 3 year old A. She keeps her very active, well fed, and hydrated. And A., who doesn't give a ton of kisses gives her a kiss goodbye every night. Not only is Crismar wonderful with A. she also helps us out a ton, taking on all of A.'s laundry, as well as helping out around the house with dishes and meal prep. We are very very happy with Crismar, and gladly recommend her for any family.

-Chelsea
